message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn, how about a 55/45 split? Time is ticking, and it's hurting you more than me.
I'm still willing to compromise, 58-42 is a better deal for you than my first offer.
Let's stop wasting time. 60/40 is my final offer. Take it or leave it, the clock is ticking.
I won't give up, 57-43 is still a better deal for me than your 'final offer'.
Okay, Alice, let's be realistic. 52/48.  Take it before inflation eats away even more of your share. This is your chance to get something substantial.
